verses.verse: שִׁ֣ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> O sing לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> song חָדָ֑שׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new שִׁ֥ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> sing לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> all the earth

שִׁ֣ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> bless שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name בַּשְּׂר֥וּ <S%H1319><s%> shew forth מִיּֽוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> from day לְ֝י֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> his salvation

סַפְּר֣וּ <S%H5608><s%> Declare בַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen כְּבוֹד֑וֹ <S%H3519><s%> his glory בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> among all people נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6381><s%> his wonders

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For גָ֘ד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and greatly נוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> he [is] to be feared ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> above all gods

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> For all the gods הָעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> of the nations אֱלִילִ֑ים <S%H457><s%> [are] idols וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> made

הוֹד־ <S%H1935><s%> Honour וְהָדָ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> and majesty לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> [are] before עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> him strength וְ֝תִפְאֶ֗רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and beauty בְּמִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H4720><s%> [are] in his sanctuary

הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> O ye kindreds עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glory וָעֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> and strength

הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [due unto] his name שְׂאֽוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> bring מִ֝נְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> an offering וּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H2691><s%> into his courts

הִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> O worship לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <S%H1927><s%> in the beauty קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of holiness חִ֥ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> fear מִ֝פָּנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> him all the earth

אִמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> Say בַגּוֹיִ֨ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD מָלָ֗ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed תִּכּ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> also shall be established תֵּ֭בֵל <S%H8398><s%> the world בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> that it shall not be moved יָדִ֥ין <S%H1777><s%> he shall judge עַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> righteously

יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <S%H8055><s%> rejoice הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> Let the heavens וְתָגֵ֣ל <S%H1523><s%> be glad הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and let the earth יִֽרְעַ֥ם <S%H7481><s%> roar הַ֝יָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> let the sea וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H4393><s%> and the fulness

יַעֲלֹ֣ז <S%H5937><s%> be joyful שָׂ֭דַי <S%H7704><s%> Let the field וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֑וֹ אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> rejoice כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> and all that [is] therein then shall all the trees יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> of the wood

לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> Before יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֬י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֗א <S%H935><s%> for he cometh כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בָא֮ <S%H935><s%> for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <S%H8199><s%> he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> and the people בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H530><s%> with his truth
